gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 126, Jazz 120
gameRecap.excerpt: Miami defeats Utah, 126-120. For Miami, Jimmy Butler led the way and notched a season-high 37 points (three 3PM) and seven assists aided by Bam Adebayo (23 points, seven rebounds), and Caleb Martin (18 points, five rebounds, three blocks) in the victory. Keyonte George tallied 31 points (six 3PM), four rebounds, and four assists while Lauri Markkanen recorded 25 points (four 3PM), four rebounds, six assists, and two steals for Utah in the losing effort. Miami improves to 34-26 on the season, while Utah moves to 27-34 with the loss.
